attributes.action: Immediately deport foreign nationals who break the law
attributes.additional_details: We think it will help with overcrowding in our jails & stop people coming who think they can get a free ride on our social security system while they shop lift, deal drugs, groom our young children & various other nefarious actions that they may continue to repeat because we're to soft & don't take enough action!!!!
attributes.background: Immediately deport foreign nationals who break the law back to their country of origin. If a jail sentence is required, return them to the country of origin. Why should we put up with people who disrespect our laws & way of life!!!
